data.name: Cartel Tycoon - Lieutenants Pack - Guerilla
data.detailed_description:
“Guerrilla warfare is a war of the masses, a war of the people.”

From deep in the jungles of Puerto Roja, the trusted lieutenants of the Soldados Sin Coraza put their unique set of skills to wicked use for the most powerful drug Cartel in the country.

Unlocks access to a set of 5 Lieutenants that will aid you in your conquest:
  • Tiago Herrera - a logistical expert who can help increase the efficiency of your production buildings and then provide them with the trucks they need.
  • Nacia Herrera - an explosives expert come pyromaniac who can help you destroy your enemies and leave a mark of terror on the people of the country.
  • Simón Rivero - a manager and merchandiser who can help make sure you’re buying low and selling high, no matter the product.
  • Bernardino Correa - a police officer whose willing corruption will help keep your buildings out of the reach of the long arm of the law.
  • Vicente Castro - an officer of the Ejército Nacional and private security guard for the Mayoress, with access to equipment of the Ejército Nacional
data.about_the_game:
“Guerrilla warfare is a war of the masses, a war of the people.”

  • Nacia Herrera - an explosives expert come pyromaniac who can help you destroy your enemies and leave a mark of terror on the people of the country.

data.short_description: Add more variety to your gameplay with these 5 Guerilla lieutenants each with their own unique Abilities!
data.supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 and up
  • Processor: i5 and up
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7 ~3 Ghz / Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
